text: The Sanremo Music Festival 1957 was the seventh annual Sanremo Music Festival, held at the Sanremo Casino in Sanremo, province of Imperia between 7 and 9 February 1957. The show was presented by television presenter Nunzio Filogamo, assisted by Marisa Allasio, Fiorella Mari, Nicoletta Orsomando. According to the rules of this edition every song was performed in a double performance by a couple of singers or groups, with some artists performing multiple songs. Initially the songs accepted for the festival were 20 then dropped to 19, as it is excluded from the second evening "La cosa più bella" performed by Carla Boni and Tonina Torrielli, because it was already published in a juke box of Milan in a version engraved by Cristina Jorio.
